contentrichtext.text: {{for|the school in Orpington|St Olave's Grammar School}} {{Infobox UK place | official_name= St Olaves | country= England | region= East of England | os_grid_reference= TM458994 | latitude= 52.537 | longitude= 1.623 | label_position =bottom | post_town= | postcode_area= | postcode_district= | dial_code= | shire_county= [[Norfolk]] | hide_services= Yes |static_image = [[File:St Olaves wind pump - geograph.org.uk - 242656.jpg|240px]] |static_image_caption= <small>St Olaves wind pump</small> }} '''St Olaves''' is a [[village]] in the [[England|English]] [[county]] of [[Norfolk]]. The village is situated on the [[River Waveney]] in England, some {{convert|10|km|0}} south-west of the town of [[Great Yarmouth]] and the same distance north-west of the [[Suffolk]] town of [[Lowestoft]]. It is within [[The Broads National Park]].<ref>Ordnance Survey (2005). ''OS Explorer Map OL40 - The Broads''. ISBN 0-319-23769-9.</ref> Today the village forms part of the [[civil parishes in England|civil parish]] of [[Fritton and St Olaves]], which in turn is within the [[Non-metropolitan district|district]] of [[Great Yarmouth (borough)|Great Yarmouth]] in Norfolk. However prior to the [[Local Government Act 1972]], the village was within [[Lothingland Rural District]] in Suffolk.<ref>[[Local Government Act 1972]], Schedule 1 Part II Non-metropolitan counties.</ref> St Olaves Bridge, a [[suspension bridge]], is the first bridging point on the Waveney above [[Great Yarmouth]]. [[Haddiscoe railway station]], on the [[Wherry Lines]] service between [[Norwich]] and [[Lowestoft]], is across the bridge approximately {{convert|1|km|0}} from the centre of the village. St Olaves used to have its own [[St Olaves railway station]], but this is now closed. On the site of the [[St. Olaves Priory, Herringfleet|priory]] dedicated to St Olaves, there is Priory Mill, a drainage windpump. ==References== {{Reflist}} == External links== {{Commons category|St Olaves}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Saint Olaves}} [[Category:Villages in Norfolk]] [[Category:Villages in Suffolk]] {{Norfolk-geo-stub}}
